"Golden Shanty" [There are 3 books with this title by Edward Dyson. Details of all three books are shown here, to avoid any confusion.]:--

* A Golden Shanty: Australian Stories and Sketches in Prose and Verse by Bulletin Writers (1890)--see Bulletin Writers entry.

* A Golden Shanty (1911?) and The Golden Shanty (1929). Eleven stories by Edward Dyson, illustrated by Phil May--HTML--EPUB--MOBI

The book was published twice with slightly different titles, although the table of contents and the illustrations are the same for both, except for the title of the book and the title of the first story. The text of the stories "A Golden Shanty" and "The Golden Shanty" is exactly the same.
